title: Bitcoin ETF Giant BlackRock Files to Launch Ethereum Staking ETF
contentSnippet: Investment firm BlackRock filed the S-1 registration statement for a new Ethereum staking ETF, ETHB, separate from its existing ETHA fund.

title: The Daily: Robinhood’s expansion plans, BlackRock’s staked Ethereum ETF filing, Strategy’s biggest Bitcoin buy since July, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Ondo Finance Says Biden-Era SEC Investigation Closed With No Charges
contentSnippet: Ondo Finance said that tokenization’s future looks brighter in the U.S. following the SEC’s closure of a years-long probe into its business.

title: 40% of Canadian Crypto Users Flagged for Tax Evasion Risk, Canadian Tax Authority Reveals
contentSnippet: Canada’s tax agency says legal gaps limit its ability to track crypto-related income as it recovers $100 million through audits and pushes for tighter regulation.

title: Script to Nuke AI Features from Windows 11 Goes Viral Amid Privacy Backlash
contentSnippet: A GitHub script that disables Copilot, Recall, and other AI components in Windows 11 is going viral, echoing ongoing concerns about Microsoft’s push.

title: Bitcoin ETFs Pull in $352 Million to Extend Rebound While XRP Funds Remain Hot
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs capture $352 million as bearish bets retreat, hinting investor pessimism may have reached its low point.

title: BitMine reports $13.2 billion in holdings as ETH treasury expands after November slowdown
contentSnippet: Tom Lee said BitMine is seeing improving market conditions roughly eight weeks after October’s liquidation shock.

title: Binance post confirming insider trading sends ‘year of the yellow fruit’ meme token even higher
contentSnippet: The suspected token, called "year of the yellow fruit," was promoted using official Binance channels just seconds after it was issued onchain.

title: Tom Lee’s BitMine Buys $429 Million in Ethereum as ETH Rebounds
contentSnippet: Ethereum is up nearly 11% on the week, and top ETH treasury firm BitMine is still adding to its $12 billion stash.

title: ICP Rises, Keeping Price Above Key Support Levels
contentSnippet: Internet Computer rose, keeping the price above the $3.40 support zone, with early session volume spikes failing to produce a sustained breakout.

title: Yearn Finance details $9 million yETH exploit, confirms partial recovery and outlines remediation plan
contentSnippet: DeFi protocol Yearn Finance has detailed how a multi-phase numerical bug and unsafe math enabled an exploiters steal rought $9 million in assets.

title: UK’s Anti-Corruption Strategy Targets Crypto Sanctions Evasion
contentSnippet: As part of the newly announced strategy, the UK will host an Illicit Finance Summit next year focused on enhancing international cooperation.

title: CoreWeave Stock Falls 8% on $2B Convertible Debt Offering
contentSnippet: Though remaining sharply higher than their IPO price, shares have struggled over the past six months, losing 50%.

title: Strategy Drops Nearly $1 Billion on Bitcoin, Marking Largest BTC Buy in Months
contentSnippet: Strategy unveiled its largest Bitcoin purchase in over 100 days, but the company's stock price was little changed on Monday.

title: Digital Assets to Shift From Disruption to Integration in 2026, CoinShares Says
contentSnippet: 'Hybrid finance' is taking hold as traditional institutions tokenize funds and deposits on public blockchains.

title: Circle partners with Bybit in push to drive USDC adoption outside Coinbase ecosystem
contentSnippet: Bybit will increase USDC’s presence across its ecosystem by boosting liquidity in spot and derivatives markets.

title: CoinDesk's Most Influential 2025
contentSnippet: CoinDesk presents our annual list of the most influential individuals in crypto this year.

title: Argentina’s Central Bank to Allow Banks to Provide Crypto Services in 2026
contentSnippet: Argentina’s central bank is reportedly drafting new rules to allow banks to offer customers digital asset-related services as early as April 2026.

title: Tether-backed payments startup Oobit expands into US
contentSnippet: The tap-to-pay payments firm is partnering with B2B2C turnkey provider Bakkt to operate across all 50 states.

title: Pye Finance Raises $5M Seed Round Led by Variant and Coinbase Ventures
contentSnippet: The platform aims to make locked Solana staking positions tradable via an onchain marketplace.

title: Most Influential: Donald Trump
contentSnippet: Without the turnaround of Donald Trump on crypto, the road toward a U.S. governmental embrace of the new technology would likely have been a steeper climb.

title: Most Influential: Rep. French Hill
contentSnippet: Rep. French Hill's name may or may not end up on any of the final legislation that becomes crypto law in the U.S., but he was the one driving it forward.

title: Most Influential: Ross Ulbricht
contentSnippet: Silk Road founder Ross Ulbricht was pardoned by U.S. President Donald Trump — kicking off a wave of pardons among some of the crypto industry’s biggest names.

title: BlackRock moves to add staked Ethereum ETF with fresh SEC filing
contentSnippet: BlackRock is seeking the Securities and Exchange Commission's sign-off for a staked Ethereum exchange-traded fund.

title: SEC ends Biden-era investigation into Ondo Finance without charges, firm says
contentSnippet: The resolution comes as U.S. policymakers reassess digital asset regulation and begin formally evaluating tokenized securities.

title: Stable, a Bitfinex-backed Layer 1 using Tether’s USDT for gas, launches mainnet and native token
contentSnippet: The project also launched the Stable Foundation — a new independent organization set up to shepherd the Stable blockchain.

title: Zcash Founder Helped to Create This Anonymous Phone Service
contentSnippet: Zooko Wilcox consulted with new anonymous phone service Phreeli on implementing a zero-knowledge proof system to preserve user privacy.

title: Morning Minute: Beeple Goes Mega-Viral with Robot Dogs
contentSnippet: Does this mean we're going to run back the 2021 digital art mania kicked off after Beeple's last viral moment?

title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy buys another 10,624 bitcoin for $963 million as treasury holdings reach 660,624 BTC
contentSnippet: Strategy's holdings account for more than 3% of the total 21 million bitcoin supply — worth around $60 billion.

title: Robinhood Expands Crypto Offerings With Futures, Staking, and Stock Tokens
contentSnippet: The financial services company is growing its product suite as it looks to push deeper into global crypto markets.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
